column1: '''Sir Ian Holm Cuthbert''' [[Order of the British Empire
column2: CBE]] (born [[12 September]] [[1931]]) voiced [[Frodo Baggins]] in the BBC radio adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column3: The Lord of the Rings]]''. Years later he played [[Bilbo Baggins]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column4: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], and Old Bilbo Baggins in [[The Hobbit (film series)

column1: Ian Holm is the father of [[Harry Holm]], who played [[Elanor Gardner
column2: Elanor Fairbairns]] in the 1981 radio series.

column1: ==Quotes==
{{quote
column2: Bilbo is a character to whom things seem 'to happen'! But once put to his mettle, once put to the test, he comes up trumps.
column3: Ian Holm, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Official Movie Guide]]''}}

column1: {{quote
column2: These things are like boats with toes.
column3: Ian Holm about prosthetic Hobbit feet}}

column1: ==Roles==
* [[2014]] - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - Old [[Bilbo Baggins]]
* [[2012]] - ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' - Old Bilbo Baggins
* [[2007]] - ''[[The Real Middle-earth (documentary)]]'' - Narrator
* [[2003]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' - Bilbo Baggins
* [[2002]] - ''[[The Making of The Lord of the Rings (documentary)]]'' - Bilbo Baggins (archive footage)
* [[2002]] - ''[[A Day in the Life of a Hobbit]]'' - Himself, Bilbo Baggins (archive footage)
* [[2001]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' - Bilbo Baggins
* [[2001]] - ''[[Quest for the Ring]]'' - Himself, Bilbo Baggins (archive footage)
* [[1981]] - [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]] - [[Frodo Baggins]]

column1: ==Awards==
* [[2002]] - '''[http://www.cinemaclips.com/PFCS.htm PFCS Award]''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''
* [[2004]] - '''[http://www.bfca.org/ Critics' Choice Award]''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''
* 2004 - '''[http://www.nbrmp.org/ NBR Award]''', Best Acting by an Ensemble, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King''
* 2004 - '''[http://www.sagawards.org/ SAG Award]''', Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King''
